pr_title: Makes github actions re-use prior stage

timeline.message:
Makes github actions re-use prior stage

Before, we didn't! cc @anuraaga

timeline.bodyText: upload/download flattens the paths.. super weird.
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -92,8 +91,9 @@ jobs:
       - uses: actions/download-artifact@v2
         with:
           name: zipkin-server-jars
+          path: zipkin-server/target/
